showScoreExcerpt:
“ ‘Fat Ham’ may not be all that one might expect from a Pulitzer-winning work, but the audience enjoyed this zippy production which offers lighthearted laughs, colorful characters and a brisk tempo—all thanks to Ali’s beyond the proscenium staging.”
